## Loading in Homicide Data

```{r Loading in Homicide Data}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
homicides <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")

homicides <- homicides %>% 
  mutate(city_name = paste(city, state, sep = ", "))

```
## Cleaning the data

```{r Cleaning the data}
library(tidyr)
library(forcats)
library(lubridate)


unsolved <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city_name == "Baltimore, MD") %>% 
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date)) %>% 
  mutate(month_data = month(reported_date),
         year_data = year(reported_date)) %>% 
  group_by(month_data, year_data) %>% 
  summarize(total = n()) %>% 
  #arrange(year_data) %>% 
  mutate(date = paste(month_data, year_data, sep = "-1-"),
         date = mdy(date)) %>% 
  mutate(colder_vs_warmer_months = month(month_data) == "11" |
                                   month(month_data) == "12" |
                                   month(month_data) == "1"  |
                                   month(month_data) == "2"  |
                                   month(month_data) == "3"  |
                                   month(month_data) == "4") 
  mutate(colder_vs_warmer_months = as.factor(colder_vs_warmer_months),
         colder_vs_warmer_months = fct_recode(colder_vs_warmer_months,
                                              "Summer" = "FALSE",
                                              "Winter" = "TRUE"))

```
